text: Wendell Lucena Ramalho (21/22 November 1947 – 23 May 2022), known as just Wendell, was a Brazilian football goalkeeper and coach. He played seven matches for the Brazil national football team between 1973 and 1974. He was born in Recife, Brazil. Wendell died on 23 May 2022 in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil at the age of 74.Morre Wendell, ex-preparador de goleiros campeão do mundo com a seleção brasileira ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Footballers from Recife
title: Wendell (footballer, born 1947)
